titles.title: Congratulating Miss Lauren Nelson for being crowned Miss America and thanking the participants in and supporters of the Miss America Competition for their contributions to young women's lives and communities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 2/8/2007--Introduced. Congratulates Miss Lauren Nelson for being crowned Miss America. Thanks the participants in and supporters of the Miss America Competition for their contributions to young women's lives and communities.
